name: Lightning [ROBLOX]
description:
A theme to use for all you ROBLOX users. Please don't touch anything unless you know what it is. 
Basic lightning wallpaper with some nice color changes to the header/search bar and party color.

[Basically for all you non-scripters and lazy people who can't or don't want to make their own]
